item.title: About
item.description: This is just a simple blog to keep some how-to and tips about DevOps and SysAdmin subjects.

item.title: Create chroot jail for ssh access
item.description: Setup group and users groupadd jailusers adduser userjailed usermod -a -G jailusers userjailed Setup the jail directories mkdir -p /var/jail/{dev,etc,lib,usr,bin,lib64} mkdir -p /var/jail/usr/bin chown root.root /var/jail You also need the /dev/null file:

item.title: Dokcer Tips and Tricks
item.description: Remove containers docker ps -a | grep 'hours' | awk '{print $1}' | xargs docker rm You can adapt 'hours' with days or other things to match what you want to delete.
